summary: Completely rebuilt footer section element by element to match Figma design pixel-perfect. Extracted all specifications from desktop-figma.css: Final Footer (1440px width, 404px height), BG Footer (398px height, #22165E background), Vector-Footer top border (9px height, #EB55C8), Footer-Items container (1235.5px width, 318px height). Implemented About Us column (421px width, gap 24px, title 16px/24px font-weight 900, description 14px/21px text-justify, trust badges 203.88px width with 61.76px badges, gap 9.31px). Implemented Useful Links and Popular Courses columns (214px width each, 179px content width, gap 64px between columns, links 14px/28px). Added vertical divider (220px height, rotated 90deg). Implemented bottom bar with social icons (135px width, 16px icons, gap 24px) and copyright (263px width, 10px/15px font, 14px icon). All typography uses Vazirmatn with font-feature-settings and font-variation-settings. RTL alignment verified with items-end and text-right throughout.
